template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a {physical_system} that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a autonomous delivery fleet that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Continuously analyze live fleet data to optimize operational parameters within safety limits, monitor real-time performance, and report efficiency gains.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise prompt under 40 words for an autonomous delivery fleet optimization task. The task involves live data analysis, parameter adjustments with safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting improvements. 

I need to condense all these elements into a single sentence while keeping it plain English. Let me focus on the core actions: analyzing, adjusting, monitoring, and reporting. 

The word count is tight, so I’ll use phrases like "operational parameters" to bundle the adjustments and "real-time performance" to cover monitoring. Safety constraints must be mentioned explicitly. 

Okay, here’s a draft: "Continuously analyze live fleet data to optimize operational parameters within safety limits, monitor real-time performance, and report efficiency gains." That covers all points in 23 words.
